item.title: Cypress - Lesson 1: Introduction
item.description: Introduction Hi everyone and welcome to the first lesson about Cypress. Cypress is a next generation front-end testing tool build for the modern web.

item.title: Cypress - Lesson 2: Your first test
item.description: Now that everything is set up, we can write the first test for our application. In essence, an automated test is a set of instructions that lives inside a javascript file.

item.title: Cypress Learning Journey
item.description: Hi everyone, and welcome to my Cypress learning journey. I have been curious about automating front-end tests for a while now, and decided to deep my toes into it.

item.title: NextJS - Lesson 1: Introduction
item.description: If you prefer the video version of this lesson, click here: Youtube Video. Hi everyone and welcome to the first lesson.

item.title: NextJS - Lesson 2: Routing
item.description: Lesson 2 complete code: üìÇ https://github.com/The-Boring-Team/nextjs-movies Introduction Hi everyone and welcome to the second lesson. In this one, we’re going to create a new page in the existing project and implement routing back and forth between the main page and the new page.

item.title: NextJS - Lesson 3: Assets, Metadata & Scripts
item.description: Lesson 3 complete code: Github Repo Introduction Hi everyone and welcome to the third lesson. Now that we have a basic understanding of routing in NextJS, let’s explore other interesting topics.

item.title: NextJS - Lesson 4: Pre-Rendering & Data Fetching
item.description: Lesson 4 complete code: Github Repo üèûÔ∏è Episode 4 slider Introduction Hi everyone and welcome to the fourth episode. Now that we understand the basics, let’s explore the core concepts behind the reason why NextJS is truly a powerful framework.

item.title: NextJS - Lesson 5: Dynamic Routes
item.description: üèûÔ∏è Episode 5 slider Github branch: here Slides: here Introduction Hi everyone and welcome to the fifth episode. In this one, we’ll explore a concept in NextJS called Dynamic Routes.

item.title: NextJS - Lesson 6: Server Side Rendering
item.description: Introduction Hi everyone and welcome to episode 6 in the NextJS series. In this one, we’re going to tackle some very interesting topics.

item.title: NextJS - Lesson 7: Deploying to Vercel
item.description: Introduction Hi everyone and welcome to episode 7, the last one in the NextJS series. In this one, you’ll learn how to:

item.title: NextJS Learning Journey
item.description: I’ve been curious for quite a while to learn more about NextJS, so I’m doing that! I’m researching the topic and creating written lessons/videos talking about NextJS while building a project.
